amendment.description: Amendment sought to give the Governor of a State the ability to opt out of the Cross-State Air Pollution Rule portion of the bill if the Governor determines that implementing such provision would increase the overall cost of complying with EPA's rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-453 to give the Governor of a State the ability to opt-out of the Cross-State Air Pollution Rule portion of the bill if the Governor determines that implementing that provision would increase the overall cost of complying with EPAs rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 233 (Roll no. 119).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Pallone.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 233 (Roll no. 119).
